tool.name: define_xml_elements

param.name: fc_in
param.dialogReference: Feature Class of interest for adding metadata. Can be feature class, shapefile, etc.

param.name: processing_dir
param.dialogReference: Output directory. Required argument, but only relevant for a feature class as this directory will house an intermediary xml file to be used in importing updated metadata to the feature class.

param.name: xml_csv
param.dialogReference: path/to/populated/csv from previous step (step_1). Note that this must be filled out with desired values for attrdef and attrdefs prior to running. It will run, however the metadata will not be changed.

tool.summary: After executing step_1 on the feature of interest, follow instructions on Github to populate csv with desired values for attrdef and attrdefs. Save and use as argument in this function to populate the metadata for the input feature.
